sentences.sContent: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
sentences.sCn: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。

sentences.sContent: Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.
sentences.sCn: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。

trans.tranOther: used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it
